特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be conducted through short lectures, seminars, discussion groups and group reading sessions. A strong emphasis will be placed on pair and group work.

トピック.授業計画1:
All 42 sessions are conducted face-to-face

トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to spend upwards of three hours reviewing classwork, completing reading and writing assignments, working on projects, and preparing for discussions outside of class time each week.
